body_html:
CC @martinwicke for overall issues with building custom ops.
We are adding cherrypicks to 1.5 release to include cuda_config.h in our released pip packages. CC @av8ramit for that.
for nsync header files, I think we should have an easier way, or at least instructions to include the include direcotory? CC @m3bm3b for that.
For cuda, I think we should add that to instructions that including CUDA path is necessary.
body_text:
CC @martinwicke for overall issues with building custom ops.
We are adding cherrypicks to 1.5 release to include cuda_config.h in our released pip packages. CC @av8ramit for that.
for nsync header files, I think we should have an easier way, or at least instructions to include the include direcotory? CC @m3bm3b  for that.
For cuda, I think we should add that to instructions that including CUDA path is necessary.
body:
CC @martinwicke for overall issues with building custom ops.
We are adding cherrypicks to 1.5 release to include cuda_config.h in our released pip packages. CC @av8ramit for that.
for nsync header files, I think we should have an easier way, or at least instructions to include the include direcotory? CC @m3bm3b  for that.
For cuda, I think we should add that to instructions that including CUDA path is necessary.
